page.title: 11LITTLE CHEF
page.content: The Little Chef Restaurant has been standing for 11 years by the busy A45 Newmarket By-pass. In the summer time the busiest day is Saturday and in the winter it is Wednesday. They start at 7.00am and finish at 10.00pm. Altogether they have 14 staff. The food comes from Pine and May and it is delivered 3 times a week. They have approximately 1500 customers a week. The site belongs to B.P garages. The name Little Chef was made up by a man called Lord Forte and it now belongs to the Trust House Forte group of hotels.
